item.title: LISTEN: Lions using a piece of the Pies as inspiration
item.description: Join Damian Barrett and Nathan Schmook for AFL Daily

item.title: Get your seats: Tickets on sale for AFL rounds 1-15
item.description: Tickets for all 2024 Toyota AFL Premiership Season matches until the end of round 15 are on sale from 12pm AEDT on Wednesday

item.title: Mark these in your calendar: The 24 must-watch games in 2024
item.description: You won't want to miss some of these mouthwatering clashes

item.title: Dynamic duo shines as Pies shake off cobwebs
item.description: Nick Daicos and Jordan De Goey shone for Collingwood in its 30-point win over Richmond in the AAMI Community Series

item.title: Delayed concussion symptoms rule Freo ruck out of practice match
item.description: Delayed concussion symptoms have ruled Fremantle ruck Luke Jackson out of Saturday's AAMI Community Series clash

item.title: Young gun 'touch and go' for R1, luckless Saint injured again
item.description: Marcus Windhager has undergone hand surgery while Hunter Clark, who had just left concussion protocols, has suffered another injury

item.title: Vale Jesse Baird
item.description: AFL CEO Andrew Dillon, AFL umpire and close friend Brett Rosebury, AFL goal umpire Steve Piperno and AFL national goal umpire coach David Dixon have released a statement on the passing of Jesse Baird

item.title: Follow it LIVE: Magpies v Tigers practice match
item.description: Don't miss a section of the action as Collingwood and Richmond face off in the AAMI Community Series

item.title: 'Fail our way to the top': Why Fagan's Lions will risk it all again
item.description: Chris Fagan tells Damian Barrett how he helped his player deal with Grand Final heartbreak, and why they're ready to back up in 2024

item.title: TEAMS: Dees make Clarry call, no Blues speedster
item.description: The teams have been announced for Wednesday night's AAMI Community Series match between Carlton and Melbourne

item.title: The 'under the radar' selection narrative at the Bulldogs
item.description: Sam Darcy and Rory Lobb are set to fight it out for the third tall spot in the Western Bulldogs' forward line alongside Aaron Naughton and Jamarra Ugle-Hagan

item.title: 'Pure attributes': Yze explains Tiger's surprise role change
item.description: Richmond coach Adem Yze sat down with AFL.com.au's Josh Gabelich ahead of his first season in charge
